name: Marc Love Prototypes
description:
Prototype 1 - Changing Of Seasons

A processing application which aims to create the aesthetic feeling of the changing of seasons.

Prototype 2 - Planet Hopper

A game which focuses on a minimalist single button concept in which you use the mouse click to jump between planets using their gravitational pull. the goal is to reach the green planet.

Prototype 3 - Pushbike Racing

A two player racing game in which players race each other using push bikes. Players can fight each other by kicking them into obstacles.

Prototype 4 - Beat Boxing

**Requires Leap Motion Device

Utilising the Leap Motion hand tracking device, you can punch targets using your hands to the beat of songs much like guitar hero.
